text: The star is now back home from the hospital and is recovering from her terrible health scare. Modern Family actress Sarah Hyland took to social media on Thursday night to share a pic on Insta Stories that showed her with a really swollen face and in the hospital, shocking fans. She noted that she was ‘ torn from work against my will ’ when she was checked in on Monday. Hyland did not mention her illness. We know however that the star did undergo a kidney transplant back in 2012 after struggling with kidney dysplasia. Last year she also revealed that her face is sometimes swollen from her life - saving medication, steroid Prednisone. Today, one insider told People that : ‘ Sarah had a scare and was hospitalized. It was scary, but thankfully she is better and is home. ’
